Text: Enron Center South Parking GarageTO ALL EIM EMPLOYEES PARKING IN ECS PARKING GARAGE Please note that there are reserved parking spaces on the th floor of the parking garage If you park in a reserved parking space your car will be towed Thanks Marsha
Floor Talk Q AThere will be a floor talk and QA at pm today on the ECS th floor Please try to attend Regards Jeff McMahon and Ray Bowen

Move to Enron Center SouthTO ALL HOUSTON BASED EMPLOYEES MOVING TO ENRON CENTER SOUTH Thanks to all of you for your patience and assistance during the move process Just a couple of things we want to remind you ofupdate you on Friday October is move day Please assure all boxes are packed by pm Movers will begin at pm Remember to get rid of as much as you can prior to moving space is limited There are boxes in the freight elevator lobby Feel free to take as many as you need There are also shred bins which are the large blue containers Please put only confidential papers in these bins as we will be paying for shredding by the pound Because movers will begin at pm on Friday the Graphics department will need to begin packing as early as possible No requests will be taken after noon on Friday In an effort to help you with your packing on Friday and your unpacking on Monday EIM Office of the Chairman will be supplying lunch for those wishing to stay in and packunpack during the lunch hour If you have any move related questions please contact Marsha at x Thanks again to all of you for your cooperation and a special thanks to all the Points of Contact for a job well done on preparing churns and passing along information Jeff and Ray

PLEASE READIt has been brought to our attention that someone has written an offensive and inappropriate comment on the wall in the mens restroom located at ECS Security has been notifed of the incident At Enron every employee is expected to adhere to the values that the Company has established These values govern the way we conduct ourselves with coworkers and customers Employees are expected to be respectful courteous and professional in all working relationships Offensive andor derogatory comments are unacceptable in the work place We want to be absolutely clear that this type of behavior will not be tolerated and is grounds for immediate termination Jeff and Ray
